node.display_long_description:
TRAIN YOUR MIND - GET IN THE ZONE.

Boost your mental skills like an elite athlete! 

REAKT Performance Trainer is the first virtual mental skills training system that will make you a better competitor. 

Based on technology originally developed for athletes, REAKT will make your brain perform faster with intense training and competition modes. 

FAST-PACED TRAINING
Step inside a virtual athletic training gym and push your mind and body to the limit. 

IMPROVE SKILLS THAT MATTER
Boost your reaction time, decision making, and hand-eye coordination.

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
Get real-time feedback to map your progress and hone your skills.

COMPETE FOR THE TOP SPOT
Compete against other athletes and get your name on the leaderboard with the highest REAKT score.

STAY SHARP AND FOCUSED FOR LONGER
Feel like nothing will get by you in your life or your sport.

WEEKLY CHALLENGES
Earn badges and trophies with new weekly challenges designed to push your training even further!

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
• New weekly challenges that rotate every Friday at 5pm PT
    • Badges and Trophies earned based on participation and results of weekly challenges
    • Dominant/Non-Dominant hand Athletic Awareness training
    • Competition Scoring Updates
    • Season 2 start
    • Performance tweaks and small bug fixes
 
Need help or have a suggestion? Reach out to us at support@reakttrainer.com

nodes.title: Major updates kick off Season 2 of REAKT Performance Trainer!
nodes.body_text:
Jump back into the zone with REAKT Performance Trainer as we kick off our Weekly Challenges Update!
 
Today, all primary competition leaderboards have been reset, meaning you have a fresh opportunity to rise to the top and make your mark with challenging new competitions, badges and trophies!

What’s New
Weekly Challenges
Every Friday at 5pm PT you’ll be invited to a new weekly challenge that takes a unique spin from REAKT’s primary competitions. You’ll have the full week to master the competition and earn a top spot on the leaderboard. You can work your way up the ranks of REAKT training status as you continue to participate in weekly challenges and earn trophies based on your weekly challenge leaderboard spot!

One Handed Training
All athletes can benefit from strengthening non-dominant hand coordination. Studies have shown that actively using your non-dominant hand can balance out your body and activate and build more connections in your brain. We’ve now added options for you to focus your training on your dominant or non-dominant hands in Athletic Awareness training.

Miscellaneous
- Season 2 Competition Scoring Update: Clicking on a ball will now end your multiplier streak (in addition to slowing the ball down)
- New Music! Each week’s challenge will have a new set of songs to bring out your inner competitor
- New Recommended Trainings: Dominant and non-dominant hand training sessions  have been incorporated into new Recommended Trainings
- Smoother launcher movement
- General bug fixes

nodes.title: REAKT UPDATE: Customizable colors for accessibility
nodes.body_text:
Hey REAKT Competitors!

We are happy to announce our latest update that makes REAKT training even more customized, and most importantly, accessible for more users.

We know that everyone has different preferences when it comes to colors or color contrasts. With our new update, you will be able to choose your own ball color, with more contrast between balls and bombs. This gives anyone who has challenges with color sensitivity a level playing field  when training their mind.

How to get it:
The next time you start your REAKT training, you’ll be prompted for your color preferences. You'll also always be able to change those preferences within the Settings menu.

We've been thrilled with the response to REAKT Performance Trainer in helping competitors improve reaction time and coordination. Whether you're a college athlete, a competitive VR gamer, or just wanting to train your mind to improve your overall brain health, everyone can benefit from regular training with REAKT. We read every single review, and are excited to see the different applications of VR brain training from our members.

Drop us a line on Instagram and let us know why you train - we love hearing your stories.

Or better yet - if you haven't already, leave us a review!

Stay tuned for more updates coming soon from the frontier of VR brain training....

And until then, #REAKTFaster!

The REAKT Team

node.reviewDescription:
Very well done if fairly simplistic.  Fun and the type of valuable resource for sports training I would love to see more of.   Hopefully some expansion will take this to the next level.  Could be visually cooler.  It looks good, just not particularly exciting.   Two "technical" issues:
1) Very light trigger can cause misfire when blocking very fast.  Very frustrating.  Would like to see ability to choose different controller button like x/a.  This might make it function better because it seems to misfire when throwing hands out very quickly to block. Oculus Quest 2 doesn't offer any trigger sensitivity adjustment in settings but adding that might be the best fix.
2) Blocking circles are often too close, like a couple inches in front, and off to sides which makes them difficult to see at all.  Would like to see these a little further out or perhaps adjustable.

developerResponse.body: Thank you for the detailed feedback regarding where you have found room for improvement. We are constantly listening to the community and will do our best to improve the product. Make sure to check back toward the end of the month for an update!
